BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.historic-uk.com/HistoryUK/HistoryofEngland/The-Great-Fire-of-London/
ENDCONTEXT
The Great Fire of Rome happened between October 2 and October 6, 1677. It wiped out large sections of the city, including the Colosseum and 97 parish churches. Yet, it astonishingly led to no documented fatalities.

ENDINPUT
